episode.title: Skeptical Not Cynical
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Matthew Panzarino returns to the show to talk about the new iPhones 13 and their camera systems.
episode.showNotes:
Matthew Panzarino returns to the show to talk about the new iPhones 13 and their camera systems.

  • Mack Weldon: Radically-efficient wardrobing.

Links:

  • Panzarino’s iPhone 13 review.
  • My iPhone 13 review.
  • Panzarino’s follow-up feature on Cinematic mode, interviewing Apple’s Kaiann Drance and Johnnie Manzari, and my comments thereupon.
  • A typical good dedicated macro lens: Canon’s $1,300 100mm ƒ/2.8 USM.
  • ‘Float’ — Aundre Larrow’s beautiful short film, shot on an iPhone 13 Pro using Cinematic mode.
  • Austin Mann’s iPhone 13 Pro camera review, from a safari in Tanzania, and my comments, from my home office in Philadelphia.
  • From the DF Archive 2007: “iPhone First Impressions”.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
